mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEWBOARD(RNUM , RID, RPW, RCONTENT, RINVOICE, RSUBJECT, RRATING, RREF, RRESTEP, RRELEVEL, RREPLY) VALUES(REVSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{RID}, #{RPW}, #{RCONTENT}, #{RINVOICE}, #{RSUBJECT}, #{RRATING}, REVSEQ.CURRVAL, 0, 0, #{RREPLY})

INSERT INTO REVIEWBOARD(RNUM , RID, RPW, RCONTENT, RINVOICE, RSUBJECT, RRATING, RIMG, RREF, RRESTEP, RRELEVEL, RREPLY) VALUES(REVSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{RID}, #{RPW}, #{RCONTENT}, #{RINVOICE}, #{RSUBJECT}, #{RRATING}, #{RIMG}, REVSEQ.CURRVAL, 0, 0, #{RREPLY})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEWBOARD WHERE RSUBJECT=#{PNUM}

SELECT RNUM , RID, RPW, RCONTENT, RINVOICE, RSUBJECT, RRATING, RIMG, RREF, RRESTEP, RRELEVEL, RREPLY FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RANK, RNUM , RID, RPW, RCONTENT, RINVOICE, RSUBJECT, RRATING, RIMG, RREF, RRESTEP, RRELEVEL, RREPLY FROM (SELECT RNUM , RID, RPW, RCONTENT, RINVOICE, RSUBJECT, RRATING, RIMG, RREF, RRESTEP, RRELEVEL, RREPLY FROM REVIEWBOARD ORDER BY RREF DESC, RRESTEP ASC)) WHERE RSUBJECT=#{PNUM}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEWBOARD WHERE RRELEVEL=0 AND RSUBJECT=#{PNUM}
